Text:
Oops forgot to add these

Instructions
1.) Use 7Zip or Winrar to extract the file "celmech.rar"

2.) Then goto the "Celestial.Mechanica.RIP-Unleashed" folder and select all zip files.

3.) Right-click and then click extract here.

4.) Do the same for the extracted Rar files.

5.) Run "unl-celm.exe" and click extract

6.) There if done correctly you should have the game extracted.

7.) Run "Celestial Mechanica.exe" to play :D
CRC check failed. Was not able to extract/install. Using the .exe. Any advice or fix?

@LKingpin
As in the "unl-celm.exe" file? Honestly I havent the slightest... I've never heard of anything like that happening before. I'll try to do some research then.

Worked for me.
(Win7 64-bit)
Thank you for sharing, miguelsz3 =)

LKingpin, I think you'll get it proper if you download the torrent again. Maybe your file got corrupt. Re-download usually solves that problem.

@LKingpin

Sometimes if your WinRAR it older than the version used to compress the files you get a "CRC check failed" error. An update of WinRAR may solve your problem.
There are 2 seeds... This might take some time, but I'll seed when it's done.
